name: la faim féminine
description:
A series of playable poems about womanhood, consumption, and exploitation. Contains references to implied gendered violence and situations of dubious consent, as well as (non-sexual) nudity. Use the arrow keys to navigate; progression will occur.

This was the result of experimenting with Construct 3 over the course of a couple of days.

CREDITS

Images from Pixabay & WikiMedia Commons, altered in Clip Studio Paint.
